articles.description: In case you missed it, three days ago one of the cars taking part in the Roborace Season Beta Event 1.1 Round 1 smashed into the concrete barrier in the most hysterically funny way.
articles.content: The AI-controlled vehicle was lined up on the starting line, ready to start the race. Or so it seemed. Once it got the green line, however, it didn't seem interested at all in the sinuous stretch of … [+3480 chars]
